title: The Deeper Story of Christmas, Christianity & Paganism
description:
Exploring the deeper Christian story of Christmas, and digging into the Pagan & Animist roots of this time of year.

This was a special festive Rebel Wisdom Q&A with Elizabeth Oldfield, the head of the Theos think tank in the UK, which looks at society and culture from a Christian perspective, and Rune Rasmussen, a scholar of religion and expert on Nordic Animism.

Theos: https://www.theosthinktank.co.uk/

Nordic Animism: https://www.nordicanimism.com/about

Check out Rebel Wisdom's gift memberships for Xmas: https://rebelwisdom.co.uk/gift-memberships
